    NamedTupleTools.@namedtuple
    NamedTupleTools.NamedTupleTools — Module.
     NamedTupleTools

    This module provides some useful NamedTuple tooling.

    see namedtuple, isprototype, fieldnames, fieldtypes, fieldvalues delete, merge

    NamedTupleTools.delete — Function.

    delete(namedtuple, symbol(s)|Tuple) delete(ntprototype, symbol(s)|Tuple)

    Generate a namedtuple [ntprototype] from the first arg omitting fields present in the second arg.

    see: merge

    NamedTupleTools.eval
    NamedTupleTools.fieldvalues — Function.
    fieldvalues

    obtain values assigned to fields of a struct type (in field order)

    NamedTupleTools.include
    NamedTupleTools.isprototype — Function.
    isprototype( ntprototype )
isprototype( namedtuple  )

    Predicate that identifies NamedTuple prototypes.

    see: namedtuple

    NamedTupleTools.lengthof
    NamedTupleTools.namedtuple — Function.
    namedtuple(  name1, name2, ..  )
namedtuple( (name1, name2, ..) )
namedtuple(  namedtuple )

    Generate a NamedTuple prototype by specifying or obtaining the fieldnames. The prototype is applied to fieldvalues, giving a completed NamedTuple.

    Example

    julia> ntprototype = namedtuple( :a, :b, :c )

    NamedTuple{(:a, :b, :c),T} where T<:Tuple

    julia> nt123 = ntprototype(1, 2, 3)

    (a = 1, b = 2, c = 3)

    julia> ntAb3 = ntprototype("A", "b", 3)

    (a = "A", b = "b", c = 3)

    see: isprototype
